headline: Cummins (NYSE:CMI) Unveils New Electric Powertrain With Isuzu For North America
summary: Cummins (NYSE:CMI) recently announced a partnership with Isuzu Motors to introduce a new battery electric powertrain. Despite this development, the company's shares remained flat last week. This lack of movement aligns with broader market trends, as the Dow Jones and major indexes faced downward pressure following reports of elevated inflation and waning consumer sentiment. Meanwhile, key technology stocks experienced a sell-off, adding general market volatility. While Cummins's commitment to...
